face.shape: soft feminine face with a defined jawline and high cheekbones
face.eyes: almond-shaped hazel-green eyes, sharp catchlights, gaze locked on the phone screen reflection
face.brows: full natural brows with a clean arch (slightly darker than hair)
face.nose: straight slim bridge with a soft rounded tip
face.lips: natural full lips, nude-pink tone with a light gloss, slightly parted
face.skin: real skin texture with visible pores, subtle cheek flush (no beautify smoothing)

hair.style: long, center-parted, smooth with a gentle natural wave
hair.detail: hair down over shoulders, minimal flyaways

body.build: athletic, gym-trained silhouette (toned shoulders, subtle abs, strong legs and glutes)

subject.expression: confident sexy look, relaxed eyes, playful mouth pose

outfit.top: black bra/lingerie top, matte fabric, structured cups, clean edges (not lace-heavy), no logos
outfit.bottom: matching black panties, matte fabric, clean stitching, no logos
outfit.coverage_rule: non-explicit, no nipples visible, no see-through

shoes.details: thin straps, ankle strap visible, open-toe, white pedicure clearly visible

tattoos: Greek-key band tattoo wrapping around the upper thigh (clean geometric pattern)
Greek-key band tattoo wrapping around the ankle
accessories: minimal rings on the phone-holding hand

chair_pose.chair: gray upholstered chair centered in front of the mirror
chair_pose.sitting: seated deep in the chair, hips back, torso upright
chair_pose.sexy_detail: subtle back arch, shoulders back, chest slightly lifted

foreground_leg_fixed.action: left leg fully extended straight toward the mirror/camera with extreme foreshortening
foreground_leg_fixed.foreground_foot: left foot dominates the lower-left foreground, sandal straps and white pedicure clearly visible
foreground_leg_fixed.ankle_tattoo_visibility: Greek-key ankle tattoo visible on the extended left leg

other_leg_fixed.action: right leg bent and raised on the chair, knee high and near the center
other_leg_fixed.heel_visibility: right sandal heel visible near the chair edge

legs.reflection_consistency_rule: the extended left foot and leg position must match exactly in the mirror reflection (no swapped feet, no mismatched reflection, no duplicated feet)

phone_hand.action: holding the phone up near head height for the mirror selfie
phone_hand.position_rule: phone offset so it does NOT cover the face; full face visible

free_hand.action: index finger near lips in a teasing gesture

pose_action.gaze: eyes looking at the phone screen reflection

mirror.edge: clean white vertical mirror edge visible on the right side
mirror.geometry_rule: mirror perfectly flat, straight lines, physically correct reflection

background_left: white pillows plus beige/brown accent pillows near headboard
dark floor-to-ceiling curtains behind the bed, mostly closed with a thin vertical slit of daylight
warm wall glow near the bed/headboard area
background_center: open floor space leading toward the back wall
background_right: long desk/minibar counter under the TV with a few scattered items (cups/snacks) with no readable labels
small cabinet/minifridge area below the counter
a slim black tripod/light stand near the desk area
dark recessed shelf/wall niche behind the desk area
rules: no extra limbs, no duplicated legs/feet, no extra toes
keep straight lines straight (walls, mirror edge, TV, desk)
reflection integrity: left foreground foot must be the same in real view and reflection

lighting.type: warm indoor hotel light + slight daylight spill
lighting.look: warm-neutral lighting, natural shadows, no filters, no heavy HDR

camera.look: unretouched smartphone photo, low HDR, subtle grain, minimal sharpening
camera.distortion: controlled; only intentional foreshortening from the extended left leg (not fisheye)
camera.framing: vertical 9:16, full seated body visible, oversized foreground left foot in lower-left, face fully visible, phone visible but not blocking
camera.focus: face sharp and eyes sharp; foreground foot/sandal sharp; background slightly softer but detailed

exposure.metering: face/skin priority while keeping room detail

angle_lock.pose_integrity_rule: mirror reflection must match the exact chair pose and leg assignment; no swapped feet
